reviews.content: iPad 5th gen, iOS 13.3.1 - disappears when the device is rotated, rotating it back doesn’t make it re-appear.

Shitty tweak. The counter is NOT part of the statusbar and thus isn‘t visible on white background because the text stays white all the time.

Donated to de dev , wrote him messages to fix this issue. And yet, still no answer. Stay away!
Worked until 4/16 when all I get is “loading”.

switch to change cases to dead from status bar does not work on iPhone XS Max iOS 13.3
